name: Goblin Grotto
description:
Submission for MiniJam98: Empty

The tribes of The Grotto have long since become hostile.

Bonds severed, relationships atrophied.

The Goblins live in squalor, now. Distant, and unconcerned for one another.

How then, will your house survive, fair Gobiln?

Perhaps it is time to seek community with your kin.

Sail around the Goblin's Grotto, trading with the locals, and bring new life into an abandoned and worn down Goblin's Grotto!

Be advised: Goblins are fickle, and will only trade with you if they like your item. You'll have to trade up throughout the entire cavern to win goblins over to your side!

Devs:

meistermayo (https://twitter.com/meistermayo)

dwaynedev (https://twitter.com/DwayneDev_)
